data.eml:eml: New Chinese species of the genus Thalassaphorura Bagnall, 1949 (Collembola: Onychiuridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Xin, Li, Yu (2015): New Chinese species of the genus Thalassaphorura Bagnall, 1949 (Collembola: Onychiuridae). Zootaxa 3931 (2): 261-271, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3931.2.5
